rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with ample space for decorative elements and seating. This area is designed to adhere to Vastu principles by ensuring a smooth flow of energy upon entry.
A spacious living room featuring modern industrial design elements. Natural lighting is maximized with large windows and an open-plan layout.
An adjacent dining area to the living room, facilitating easy access between spaces while following Vastu guidelines for harmonious energy distribution.
A fully equipped kitchen with industrial design elements and efficient workspace. Designed in a north-eastern direction as per Vastu to promote positive energy flow.
An additional bedroom for guests, designed with natural ventilation and sufficient light. Placed in the west for balance as per local guidelines.
A quiet study area integrated into the design with optimal lighting and a comfortable seating area, aligned with Vastu principles to support concentration.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed in the southern direction, ensuring a seamless transition between indoors and outdoors.
Multiple windows strategically placed to ensure adequate natural light while maintaining privacy. Some are designed in the east and north for optimal energy flow.
Access to the rooftop terrace is provided via balcony doors. This opening respects Vastu principles and maximizes views.

rooms.description: The master bedroom is designed with a private balcony to the south and ample natural light. Vastu principles are considered by placing this room in an auspicious direction.
A secondary bedroom with sufficient space for storage and personal comfort, designed to align with Vastu recommendations.
An additional bedroom ensuring privacy for family members. This room is located in the west as per local guidelines.

A rooftop terrace serving as an outdoor living space that doubles as a garden area. Incorporates elements like seating, greenery, and water features to enhance relaxation while adhering to Vastu principles.

openings.description: A central staircase providing access between floors. The design is functional and adheres to safety regulations.
An opening leading from the first floor to the rooftop terrace, ensuring accessibility and compliance with safety norms.
